news_header: New strike warnings issued for 63 companies in technology and chemical industries, set to start on February 24, affecting 8,500 employees.
news_original_title: Teollisuusliitto jatkamassa lakkokierroksia – lakossa tuhansia työntekijöitä 63 yrityksessä
news_text: The Industry Union has announced new strike warnings affecting 63 companies, including several factories in the technology and chemical sectors, set to begin on February 24. These strikes would last five days and involve 8,500 employees. The strikes are a continuation of previous actions, with specific warnings issued for companies like Componenta and Pölkky Oy. Negotiations for a collective agreement in the technology industry have been ongoing for five months without progress, prompting these warnings.
